explanation: create user from the admin side, and send them their password by sms with addresses

parameters.name: is_verified
parameters.description: user automatically becomes unverified on phone change unless is_verified is set to true

parameters.name: how_did_you_hear_about_us
parameters.description: User how did you hear about us
